mapper.sql: channel_id, name, parent_id, weight, create_time, last_modify_time
mapper.select:
select
from article_channel ORDER by weight desc

select
from article_channel where parent_id = #{id} ORDER by weight desc
mapper.insert:
insert into article_channel
channel_id,
name,
parent_id,
weight,
create_time,
last_modify_time,
#{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update article_channel
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update article_channel set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
